result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Carl Lee Waupoose

records.addlTxt: Notice of Appearance received and filed.  bm

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose not in court, in custody.  Attorney Tyler A Jochman appointed this date in court for Carl Lee Waupoose.  Attorney Alicia H Kort in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case calendared for Status Conference this date.  Due to the State Public Defender failing to timely appoint counsel, the court appointed counsel at Milwaukee County expense.  Attorney Tyler Jochman in court and accepts appointment at County rate.  Case adjourned for Status Conference.  Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro in Room 423 of the Safety Building.
Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose not in court, in custody.  Attorney Eugene James Dietzler Esq in court for Carl Lee Waupoose.  Prosecuting attorney Kenneth Olstinski in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Dietzler is moving to withdraw from the case due to medical reasons.  Court granted Attorney Dietzler's Motion to Withdraw.  Case is adjourned to 10-7-22 at 9:00 am for status of counsel.
Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Counsel's Notice of Motion and Motion to Withdraw and to Terminate Representation of the Defendant received and filed.  bm

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose in court with attorney Eugene James Dietzler.  Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose in custody.  Student Intern Jessica Birmingham under the supervision of Assistant District Attorney Jennifer Tate for Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defense counsel waived reading of the Complaint and entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant.  Defense requests a scheduling conference date.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose in court by video with Attorney Eugene James Dietzler who appears in person.  Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Cudahy Officer Z. Desmet. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant Byron Lee Waupoose in court with Attorney Christopher J. Cherella; both appear by video.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Cudahy Officer Z. Desmet. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading and requests an arraignment date. Case is adjourned to Branch 12.  Arraignment scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Order to Produce.  Signed and Filed.  nk

Attorney Eugene James Dietzler in court, defendant Carl Lee Waupoose not in court, in custody, not produced.  Defendant's appearance waived.  Kenneth Olstinski for Alicia H. Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in Court for Order to Show Cause Hearing.  Attorney Dietzler newly appointed to case.  Case calendared for Preliminary Hearing June 22, 2022, at 2:30 pm.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose not in court, defendant in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for preliminary hearing. Defendant is not produced. SPD has not appointed counsel at this time. State requests an Order to Show cause hearing. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE to Br. 12.  Order to show cause hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Carl Lee Waupoose
Current: 4416 W Cleveland Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53219 United States  (Effective: 04-06-2022)
Prior: 5840 South Indiana Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with CAB (DOB 1/11/06); K. Braier M/W, 11/29/2006; M.J. Hahn, M/W, 06/07/2007; A. M. Latus F/W, 01/12/2006; N. A. Morrobel, F/W, 06/19/2006; Jeffery L.O., M/W; 02/24/1970; Rosario Rivera, F/W, 11/05/1973
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose in custody.  amy E spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Carl Lee Waupoose appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Carl Lee Waupoose not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 4/7/2022. Defendant is in custody at Brown County Jail. Needs to be produced for court.
